body:
Just a minor thing.

In the Deck Editor, the Status filter isn't cleared when the Reset button is pressed.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Status filter not clearing with reset filters
content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on July 15, 2014 04:14:41_

Just a minor thing.

In the Deck Editor, the Status filter isn't cleared when the Reset button is pressed.
